commentBody:
The $44 million / year commissioner (Goodell) of a $25 billion / year league (NFL) suspends a $11 million / year player (Brady, 2014 compensation) who the NE Patriot fan pays $122 / ticket (2014 avg ticket cost) to see demolish a team by the score of 45 - 7 by a soft a $145 ball that no one can definitively shown was done by Brady and that had no impact on a game played over a year ago.

And this is being heard by both district and appellate courts? Next stop the US Supreme Court?

Mind bending.

replies.commentBody: What really is mind bending are some of the questions posed by Justice Denny Chin which indicate that he was either ignorant to the facts of the case or just doesn't understand the science behind the proven ideal gas law regarding psi, in any case he came off like he hadn't spent anytime reviewing the facts and details of this case...really troubling.
